In her review, Gwen Ifill rounds up some of the finger-pointing Donald Rumsfeld employs in the book: "Mostly, Donald Rumsfeld is certain-- never more so than when he is chronicling the deficiencies of others. His list of disdain runs long-- from former secretaries of state Condoleezza Rice and Colin Powell , to Coalition Provisional Authority chief Paul Bremer ( "It remained difficult to get him to accept the idea that Iraq belonged to the Iraqis'), to former Army secretary Eric Shinseki , to former Joint Chiefs chairman Hugh Shelton , Colin Powell aide Richard Armitage, John McCain and, of course, the news media. "The most consistent censure is reserved for Colin Powell , Condoleezza Rice and anyone who operated in their diplomatic orbit. Since his return, in October, Ben Roethlisberger has tried to be a better teammate and a better person. Like the Eagles' Michael Vick , he has been contrite and has said all the right things. It would be amazing to win another Super Bowl, but it won't be like I'll say, "Do you forgive me now?' It'll just be another step in earning back everything I lost, he told the Pittsburgh Post-Gazette's Ron Cook last week. Bernie Sanders , the Department of Defense disclosed that it paid$ 285 billion over a three-year span to hundreds of military contractors that defrauded the Pentagon during the same period. With the country running a$ 14 trillion national debt, my goal is to provide as much transparency as possible about what is happening with taxpayer money, said Sen. Bernie Sanders ( I-Vt.).
